t: Out*pn of the depths I call to you, Lord!*s
Lord,*ln listen to my voice; let*ln your ears be attentive to*ln my cry for help.
Lord,*spn if you kept an account of iniquities, Lord,*ln who could stand?
But*ln with you there is forgiveness, so*ln that you may be revered.
I*pn wait for the Lord;*s I wait and*ln put my hope in his word.
I*ln wait for the Lord more*ln than watchmen for the morning — more*ln than watchmen for the morning.
Israel,*pn put your hope in the Lord.*s For*ln there is faithful love with the Lord,*s and*ln with him is redemption in abundance.
And*ln he will redeem Israel from*ln all its iniquities.
